events.message: I would like to request a refund for the sweater I purchased last week because it does not fit as expected.
The system has categorized this case under the 'Refund' cluster based on keywords related to refund and return requests.
An agent specialized in refund cases has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you would like to request a refund for your recent purchase. Iâ€™m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason you would like to return the sweater? This will help us process your refund promptly.
Sure, my order number is 12345678. The sweater is too small even though I ordered my usual size, so I would like a refund.
Thank you for the information. We can initiate your refund once you ship the sweater back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
That sounds great, thanks for the quick response and clear instructions on the refund process.
We have sent you the prepaid return label via email. Once we receive the item, your refund will be processed promptly.
We are checking in to confirm you have received the return label and ask if there is anything else we can assist you with regarding your refund.
Since there has been no further response, we are closing this case. Please reach out if you need additional assistance in the future.
